statements: UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET likes = 10, shares = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET comments = 2, likes = 15 WHERE user_id = 100;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, shares = 50, comments = 20 WHERE user_id = 123 AND post_id = 456;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET likes = (likes + 10), shares = (shares + 5) WHERE id = 789;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET likes=10, shares=5 WHERE user_id=1 AND post_id=1;
UPDATE post_metrics SET total_shares=20, total_comments=15 WHERE post_id=2;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET likes = 10, shares = 5 WHERE user_id = 1 AND post_id = 100
UPDATE post_metrics SET total_likes = total_likes + 20, total_comments = total_comments - 3 WHERE post_id = 200
UPDATE Post SET post_content = 'Updated content' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE Comment SET comment_text = 'New comment' WHERE comment_id = 3;
UPDATE Post SET post_content = 'Updated content for post 1' WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE Comment SET comment_text = 'New comment text' WHERE comment_id = 5;
UPDATE posts SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE shares SET share_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE share_id = 3;
UPDATE posts SET likes = likes + 1, shares = shares + 2 WHERE post_id = 12345;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE username = 'john_doe';
UPDATE posts SET likes = 15 WHERE post_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_likes SET timestamp = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE like_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE posts SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE user_id = '890d8822-2e96-4e2e-8026-6c20f246209b';
UPDATE user_shares SET timestamp = '2022-09-30 12:00:00' WHERE post_id = 'fbfdd7ed-99fe-4f9b-bfcb-4905a48fe732';
